name: basendx

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cbs, cnx), nat1)
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cbs, cnx), nat1)
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)

comment: Index value of the base set extractor. (Normally it is preferred to work with ` ( Base `` ndx ) ` rather than the hard-coded ` 1 ` in order to make structure theorems portable. This is an example of how to obtain it when needed.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Aug-2013.)
